pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: ボートは定員オーバーでバランスを失った。
lessons.english: The boat was off balance because it was overloaded.

lessons.japanese: アシカは大きなボールの上でうまくバランスを取った。
lessons.english: The seal kept its balance well on the large ball.

lessons.japanese: 自然界のバランスはとてもこわれやすい。
lessons.english: The balance of nature is very fragile.
